DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate the different types and subtypes of cells found in breast tumors. The investigators will do this using a variety of molecular analysis tools that may allow for improved tests. The different types of cells in breast cancer impacts the way individuals respond to various treatments.
DOC.brief_title: Molecular and Cellular Analysis of Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1. Histologically proven diagnosis of breast cancer or a carcinoma of unknown primary consistent with the presentation of a primary breast malignancy. 2. 18 years of age or older. 3. Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent do
